hackathon-description-text: NOTE: This is the page for HackRPI 2014. You can view the page for HackRPI 2015 here:
hackathon-eligibility: To be eligible, you must have confirmed an offer to attend, and then have shown up to the event.
hackathon-requirements: Make your product, submit your hack to ChallengePost.
hackathon-rules:
- YOU MUST BE AT HACKRPI TO WORK ON A PROJECT FOR SUBMISSION
- You cannot work on your project before the event begins
- Only team members may submit code to the project
- You cannot steal another team's source code
- Please listen to HackRPI Organizers
-Please see the

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 480$ total of Sparkfun Credit split between the team.
Chromeboxe Desktops for the entire team!
Leap Motions + 20$ of Steam Credit for each team member
Nexus Tablet + Tour of offices at the SUNY Nano College

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Hack Built With TI LaunchPad

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 1) Bose QC 20i noise cancelling in-ear headphones for the most creative use of the SoundTouch API
Samsung Galaxy Gear Smart Watch, WASD Keyboard 150$ Gift Certificate

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, 110 8th Street, Troy, NY 12180, USA
hackathon-location-address: Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute, 110 8th Street, Troy, NY 12180, USA
